values: I can't figure out how to work this thing, blah!!!! It's plugged in, and the computer said it was ready to be used...and I don't know what program to use, or if there is even a program on this computer for it... *tear* I'm so technologically inept!

Christ, it's been nearly a year since I last posted. Heh. I just joined myspace, heaven knows I'll probably neglect that, too :-P. Not having a computer is no fun at all. I don't even know what to write! Harry Potter comes out in less that 2 weeks! I'm excited :-D. Hmmmm...I'm still at Target...Rico and I aren't together anymore, but we're still friends...I live alone now...um.....I suppose things are pretty much the same other than that. Well, I don't think I have much else to say. I just thought it might be good to post again before they get rid of my account.

16 July!!!!!!!!! 16 July!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I'm sooooooooooo friggin excited!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1

In other news...I told Nick I'd post about the Rico situation and so I'm going to.

Stuff between him and me is going well. Stuff between him and his ex who he lives with is going very very badly. He told her that we were seeing each other and she flipped. She wants him to not spend any time alone with me until they aren't living together anymore (he's moving out probably the 9th or 10th of January). We're not going to not see each other at all, but we're going to try to see each other less over the next two weeks because he doesn't want to hurt her more than he has, and I don't want him to. It really really sucks though. I know two weeks isn't that long a time...but I'll mainly see him at work and it's so hard to be near him and not be able to speak freely, or touch him, or anything. And the week after Christmas I'm doing overnight, so I'll barely see him at all. 

I'm whining, I'll stop. It's just so frustrating...It sucks so much to not be able to do ANYTHING to help a situation.
Dammit, why do I do everything wrong??

....John Lennon was shot and killed.

We miss you, John.

I haven't felt about anyone the way I feel about Rico in a very long time...I can't stop thinking about him, and I can't stop smiling, and I can't stop spouting cliches because they all seem to make so much sense. I haven't been this happy for a long time. I love spending time with him so so much. We were talking on the phone yesterday and I wanted to see him so badly...so I went and saw him...huzzah for cars!! :-D I really really hope things work out between us. I can't wait to see him today, even though it's just at work. Not that the Target Rumor Mill isn't already grinding out stories about us, I'm sure. So many people know, news really does spread fast in that place. Ahhhh I'm so happy!!! I keep breaking into cheesy grins randomly throughout the day, I must look like such a moron to everyone else :-P. 

In other news....hmm. I don't have much other news. I'm in chemistry, and we're taking a test that she gave us like two and a half hours to do, and I finished in like 40 minutes. I mean seriously folks, it's open note, it should not take 2 and a half hours. Oh well. So needless to say, I'm bored right now. And that's why I'm on here!! :-D I got a breakfast burrito from the school cafeteria which tasted delicious but isn't sitting well. I feel like yuking. It's like my body is so used to shitty food that I can't process the real stuff anymore. Hehe.

I can't wait until 4:30!!! Hmmm, acutally being excited to go to Target is wierd.

Ahhh, chemistry. Breakfast of champions.

This class is boring!! I'm glad she gives us two breaks because man, I don't think I'd make it through class otherwise. Blech. ONly one more hour and then I'm free!! FREEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Until 4. But hopefully Target will be okay today.
I seem to spend a quarter of my time mad with jealousy over various people and things. Odd.

Everyone should go to this site: www.purevolume.com/mustangsmadras/ and listen to the music on it. Its a group called Mustangs and Madras. They're awesome!! A guy I work with does vocals and plays sax. I wish they had more songs on that site, the whole CD is fantastic. I love it I love it I love it!!!! Tell me what you think!

I'm so upset right now. I keep flipping from pissed off to depressed to just sad. A lot of people get blah after election time, right?

How dare the government try to regulate love? Fuckers. I can't believe the same-sex marriage ban passed in all 11 states in which it was on the ballot. I don't even think it should be an issue.

I hate this right now. I keep saying I'm going to go to Canada, which I actually do want to do some day, but I would feel like a coward if I run from this. Not that I know of anything I can do to help if I stay...*sigh*
Heh, who'd have thought I'd cry during Kerry's concession speech. Before Kerry even started talking, no less. So much to say, and I'm not going to say any of it...but man, am I unhappy right now.

One in the morning is NOT a reasonable time to get out of work (not one in the morning that it is right now, at least, one in the morning an hour ago. Daylight Savings screws up my system). Target has been sucking major balls recently. I used to kind of like working there. Or, at the very least, I didn't despise it...

As I look through my friends list, I realize that a hefty portion of the people on it are people I haven't even spoken to in a long time (mostly because of the fall of the House). So, a message to (in order according to my friends list) Brooke, Ted, Kindra, Kara, Eric, Rebecca, Nick, Dom, Kaley, Charlotte, and everyone else...

I miss you guys!! I'm sorry I'm so ridiculously bad at keeping in touch with people. *hugs hugs hugs*

"You HAVE to see The Pillow Book. It's pretty much just Ewan MacGregor having sex with lots of different women. LOTS of full frontal nudity.  It's like watching porn!"

-my sister yesterday

Because THAT'S why I see movies. To see Ewan MacGregor naked.

Does anyone else think John Edwards is hot? 'Cause I kinda do. 

I can't wait for the elections to be over. And I hope to god that Bush doesn't win, mostly because I really don't like him and don't agree with anything he says, but also because listening to him speak makes me nauseous. Although he certainly does give the Daily Show a lot to work with. 

It's National Coming Out Day today! They were going to have speakers and stuff at school but all of them bailed, but they still had pamphlets, and bumper stickers, and a lot of contraceptives. 

Between Christmas episodes of The Simpsons, me watching Love Actually way more often than I should, and Target having half of the Christmas stuff set already, I feel like it's almost Christmas. It's odd.

I can't wait for Team America to come out!! It looks good. Trey Parker and Matt Stone are awesome. I know a lot of people don't like South Park, but those guys are really very talented. 

Hey, now there's a Christmas episode of King of the Hill on. Dammit, people, it's still October!! The world is trying to confuse me. 

As you can tell, I can't keep my mind on one thing. Or rather, in order to keep my mind off of one thing, I can't restrict my thought process to any specific other thing. Blah.
Seanus sounds sad. Or homesick. *throws rocks at Seanus* Maybe that will make him feel better...

We have sheets at Target for guests to fill out if they have complaints about the store. Normally they say stuff about how we don't have what they want in stock, or they couldn't find any salespeople, but this one just takes the cake:

"You won. I swore to never shop at Target because your products do not last more than 90 days and then you will not allow them to be returned. Two other stores to shop at are Walmart which will probably own Target soon and Walgreens which you will put out of business and they have to charge $3 more for medical related supplies. It will be a sad day when the United States of America turns into a communist country when there is only one store in the entire United States of America to shop at. That is when I return to Europe (Western Europe, God forbid Eastern Europe they are the cause of this problem) where I came from 13 generations ago!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

So the U.S. is going to become a communist country because of...Target. Maybe they were confused because we all wear red shirts...
Zell Miller is the scariest person I've seen in my life.

I felt like updating, and yet I haven't anything to talk about. Ummm...maybe going to the Renaissance Festival on Sunday!! I'm so excited!! I missed it last year. The kittens are still doing well. They are sooo cute!! We named them all: Austin and Sam (the grey ones, named after the Keeper's Chronicles. We're keeping Austin and I'm taking him when Tamber and I stop living together), Johnny (the orange one with the tail, named after Johnny Depp), Bo (because Sara nicknamed the oldest ones Little, Bittle, and Bo when she first saw them and Bo just stuck), Hermione (from Harry Potter, of course), and Ewan (named by Laura, before we knew their genders...Ewan turned out to be female). Diana's kittens have yet to be named. I sound like one of those crazy old cat ladies!! I really have nothing else to talk about. I need to kill time before the Daily Show starts. 

To briefly talk about work, I'd like to state the fact that THE REMODEL IS FINALLY OVER!! IT'S FINALLY BLOODY OVER!!!!!!!!!!

Yay, Jon Stewart!! He's hilarious!!

Hmm...I've really nothing else to talk about. Nothing new, anyways. Still at Target, still in Broomfield, still single, still can't bloody go to Toronto...I finally registered for next semester. Woot! 

Ok, well, I think that'll be it for now. Love you all!

Tamber, I have hijacked your computer. Bob is currently engaged in an epic battle with your Ace bandage. The bandage is winning.

In other news...I'm REALLY BLOODY BORED. I could hang out in Ted's room, but they're playing Anarchy Online. As usual. Dark Age was much more interesting to watch...

And I tried watching TV. News about Easter and Passover *click* The Bachelor *click* fuzzy *click* some crap *click* Jesus movie *click* Kindergarten Cop in Spanish *click* Jesus movie which was at the same part as the other, same words and all, but with different actors with more fake blood on their faces *click* Spanish variety show *click* someone preaching *click*...

So no help there.

Not in the mood for any of my movies (well, I'd be in the mood for LotR if they weren't so long).

Read Ella Enchanted over again. The whole thing.

Played with the kittens.

Thought of hanging out with Sara, then remembered she's going to the bars with Andrea tonight. 

I'M SO BOOOOOORED!!!!!!!!!! Someone come entertain me!

Nothing like clothes shopping to make a girl feel bad about her body.

Fat fat fat.
...we would never know that when we think a thing, the thing we think is not the thing we think we think, but only the thing that makes us think the thing we think we think we think.

"Humpty Dumpty sat on a wall
Humpty Dumpty had a great fall
All the king's horses and all the king's men
Couldn't put Humpty together again."

First off, where on earth did the notion that Humpty was an egg come from?? I see nothing in the rhyme that implies that. Yet, in every picture in nursery rhyme books, he is portrayed as an egg. Ridiculous.

I definitely agree with what UFO said. Humpty was suicidal. Why else would he be sitting up on that wall?? The question is WHY he was suicidal. Which brings me to my next point.

Why were the king's horses and the king's men so close at hand? And why were they so anxious to put Humpty back together? The way I see it, the story plays out like this:

Humpty Dumpty knew secrets about the country across the sea. The country that the kingdom was at war with at that time. He was captured by all the king's men, who intended to bring him before the king to reveal what he knew. Humpty, ever faithful to his native land, refused. He daringly fought off the men and their horses and ran, with his captors in hot pursuit. He made it to the edge of the castle grounds, where there was a very high wall barricading him in. There was only one thing he could do: climb. He made it to the top of the wall, but his fear of heights had slowed him a bit, and the king's men were gaining. Humpty had no choice but to throw himself from the top of the wall.

All the king's horses and all the king's men made their way to the gates as quickly as they could, and rode to find Humpty's broken body on the other side of the wall. Try as they might, they could not heal him; his wounds were too serious, and, alas, medieval medicine was none too helpful. Unable as they were to get the information that Humpty knew, the kingdom lost the war and was conquered by the kingdom across the sea.

And so, Humpty's noble act was recorded, albiet cryptically, for all to read, so all could remember how he sacrificed himself for the sake of his home.

Now that you know how the story of Humpty Dumpty truly came to pass, you may admire his courage and selflessness each time you read his tale.

I tried writing this before, but Brooke's computer hates me. So now I'm on Ted's computer, and trying to post it again!

Last night was very fun!! I've never been that drunk before. I can't remember everything, but I do remember that Negar and Steven were making fun of me. And I did a shot of tequila for Yonara because he's in CA. And I kissed a lot of people. I can't even remember who all. Kaley...Lindsey...Tamber...Kara...Craig...ummmmm...I don't know if there were more than that. I was all over Craig, it was weird. I had a long, loud conversation about Target with Ryan (how sad, even in drunkeness that's all I talk about). And lots of people were grabbing my boobs. It was really wierd. Mostly Kaley, I think, but lots of other people, too. And I remember wanting to take care of people. Monette was really sick and I felt bad that I was too drunk to help. And I remember falling down a lot...but I suppose that's just a normal part of being that drunk. God that was fun!! I wish I could remember more. Meh, oh well.

Happy New Year everyone!!!! The first new year of the year!!

I wish I knew how to put my sentiments into words...because the way things are now, I can never express my feelings, and they just end up festering inside of me, the good ones and bad ones. And even good feelings are bad when they're bottled up and left to rot.

I feel like vomitting, and there's no toilet in which to do so...I'm going to Sooper's to buy a plunger. Does Sooper's even sell plungers? Well, I guess I'll find out, eh?

Just posting for the hell of it...I don't know, I feel obligated to post since everyone else does so much :-P. I'm at my sister's right now, watching Moulin Rouge. I was supposed to stay at my mom's tonight, but that didn't work out. Which means I can't do laundry...which sucks. Oh well!!

There's a girl at work who I've liked for a while, who I'm not sure isn't straight...but when my sister said I should ask her out, and I said "but what if she's straight?" Sara said "Are you KIDDING me?" And Sara's good at guessing orientation. So I apparently have no gaydar. 

I'm still not positive she's not straight though...but maybe I have a chance with her after all. Although I still don't have the balls to ask her out. Although I DO talk to her, and am (mostly) comfortable while doing it, which is an improvement on when I normally like people. One of my friends thinks I need to pull a "Do you like Lord of the Rings? I do. You should come over sometime and have sex with me-I mean, watch Lord of the Rings" or a "We should make out-er, uh, hang out sometime." 

I guess I'll just have to see what happens...

Well wasn't that spantacular.

I should not be trusted around motor vehicles. Nothing good ever comes of it. 

But we do have a strong mailbox. A very, very strong mailbox.

Strong enough to pull one side of my bumper AWAY from my car. 

So here's what happened.

I was backing out of the driveway, trying to go to work, and I'm used to parking in the righthand spot. Only this time, I'd parked in the lefthand spot. I backed out how normally do, though, back and to the left so I can get actually get off from the driveway and not the curb.

Only that didn't work, since I was already in the lefthand spot.

My back wheels went over the driveway, fine, and so I started turning, looking behind me so I wouldn't hit anyone. While I was looking back, it was quite impossible for me to look forward at the same time. And since the back of the car cleared, I didn't think there'd be problem with the front.

I was wrong.

The side of the car hit the mailbox. Which would have been ok. Except that just as I hit the mailbox (the exceedingly sturdy, Amazing Wonder-Mailbox), one of my wheels went off the curb. Any NORMAL mailbox would have fallen over at that point. But ours? Noooo, ours would NEVER fall over. 

Instead, the post (a big fat wooden one), which had been positioned right behind the bumper at that point, refused to budge. So the bumper decided that since the post wasn't going to move, it was going to have to. So most of the car went down the curb, while the bumper (with the exception of the blinker, which popped off) stayed hooked around the mailbox post.

So, at that point, the car was pretty much wrapped around the mailbox. It wouldn't go forward or backward, and the mailbox still wouldn't budge. So skipping most of the police stuff (no accident report, since it was my mailbox and my car), I had to pay $50 for a tow truck to pull it sideways off the mailbox. 

I shall post pictures when Tamber gets them developed.

And today's developments in the story, duct tape can do a great number of things, but it could not save my blinker. I taped the grille thingy (erm...the radiator?? uhh...) and the headlight back onto the car because they were loose, but the blinker was completely off. So I tried taping it on as well. It was too fond of freedom, apparently, and is now in hundreds of shiny orange bits all over 287.

Poor Derdlim.

Ok, well I've posted this (roughly) on both SBMB and Bagism, but I figure I should post it here as well... 

As you know, (actually, not, because I actually don't think I've mentioned this...what's the matter with me??? I don't think I've told any of my online friends, how upsetting.) I'm moving out of my mum's house into a house with some friends. Tonight is probably my last night here, and as we still haven't figured out the computer situation at our new place, I probably won't be on for a while. Hopefully not too long of a while, but I'm not sure. I just wanted to say bye to everyone, and I love you guys to bits, and I'll miss you!!!!!!!!! 

I may be on tomorrow sometime, but I just wanted to make this my official goodbye in case I can't come on. 

~*BIG BIG HUGGLES TO ALL*~
-Laila

So yeah, hopefully I'll be back soon!!! I may lose my mind without internet...I'm soooo excited about moving, though!! All of you in CO should come see my house! :-P

Bye everyone!

There's something wrong with me. There really is. So I had cramps from hell as usual all day today. And I called in sick to work, because trying to stand and walk would reduce me to a shaking and crying ball of misery. And so then what do I do? I start crying because I feel guilty. I mean, what the fuck. I never have understood myself too well, though.

I haven't just posted on here in a while...mostly it's just been quizzes and surveys (as I'm sure you've all noticed). I don't have much to say, though...let's see...

Well, I like a guy at work. And I'm actually (though extremely slowly) getting up the nerve to say more than hello and how are you to him. Not much more, but I'm getting there. He's 26 though...my mom would/will kill me if/when she finds out. I guess I'll just have to wait and see what happens...I need to not be such a flaming coward.

I'm glad I get to go to see Regionals tomorrow, I haven't gotten a chance to see the show yet and am very excited!! It worked out well, they scheduled me until 5:30 tomorrow, so I didn't have to switch with anyone. Now, for State...being the moron I am, I didn't realize that the schedule for that week was coming out so soon, so I didn't ask for the day off in time. So now I'm hoping that someone will be able to switch with me for a different day or something. 

Umm, what else...I've been spending a whole lot of time with my sister, which is awesome. It's great hanging out with her and our coworkers. She's corrupting me though...3 times the past couple of months I've had to stay at her place because I couldn't drive. Plus the fact that she's addicting me to Sex and the City. I've watched more of that show the past couple of weeks than anything else combined...thaaat's ok though. At least I'm having fun, eh? It feels sort of strange though, because she's good friends with so many of these people, and while I'm getting to be friends with some of them, it still mostly feels like they're HER friends, not mine. Well, I guess I'll get over that in time.

Ooh and I may have found a roommate!! Well, no, not MAY have found, I did find one, it's just that now we need to find a place. It's a girl from work/school, Tamber. Should be fun!! I love my mom so much, it's just that we get along so much better when I'm not living at home, and I'm sick of fighting all the time. Besides, I'm 18, it's about time I move out.

So, that is the life of Laila at the moment. I'll try to update more often...although I'm sure I say that all the time and it never happens...but I WILL try. I'm off to watch Cowboy Bebop now!! WOOT! Love you all!!
